micro_tips: To improve objection handling, clarify the specific details behind objections like price or timing to ensure your response is precisely targeted to the customer's concern.
When facing objections such as competitor or trust, acknowledge the customer's point and confirm your understanding to build rapport and effectively address their underlying issue.
To strengthen your closing, consistently propose a clear next step at the end of the conversation, which effectively guides the customer towards commitment.
reasons: No long monologue segments detected (healthy pacing).
Objections detected and empathy signals present (better handling likelihood).
Closing attempt detected (next step / demo / proposal).
